member_organisations: A ANSOL tem apenas pessoas singulares como membros.
fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Software Livre e áreas conexas (direitos de autor, mercado único digital, etc.). 
 
Cultural and Technological policies quite often affect, direct or indirectly, the Free Software ecosystem. Thus, we have been following quite closely, both in National and European environments, legislative developments regarding this issues. 
 
As examples, we have been following the Copyright directives (from the work that led to Directive 2001/29/EC and since there until the current proposals), as well as the levy reform; we have been watching with great interest what is being done regarding the use of Open Standards, as well as have been voicing our oppinions regarding more technical issues (the Radio Lockdown Directive being one example).
organisation_name: ANSOL - Associação Nacional para o Software Livre (ANSOL)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Software Livre e áreas conexas (direitos de autor, mercado único digital, etc.).
goals__remit: A "ANSOL - Associação Nacional para o Software Livre" é uma associação portuguesa sem fins lucrativos que tem como fim a divulgação, promoção, desenvolvimento, investigação e estudo da Informática Livre e das suas repercussões sociais, políticas, filosóficas, culturais, técnicas e científicas.
